FIELD.NAME: useritemsallowed
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether or not users are allowed to add their own items to the checklist

FIELD.NAME: teacheredit
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether the marking will be done by: 0 - students only (default), 1 - teacher only; 2 - both teacher and student

FIELD.NAME: theme
FIELD.COMMENT: The theme chosen to display the checklist to the users

FIELD.NAME: duedatesoncalendar
FIELD.COMMENT: Add due dates to the course calendar

FIELD.NAME: teachercomments
FIELD.COMMENT: Are teachers allowed to add comments to a user's checklist items?

FIELD.NAME: autopopulate
FIELD.COMMENT: Automatically fill in the checklist, based on the modules in the current course

FIELD.NAME: autoupdate
FIELD.COMMENT: Automatically update items that are linked to course modules (tick them off when items are complete)

FIELD.NAME: completionpercent
FIELD.COMMENT: Percentage of items that need to be checked off before the checklist is regarded as complete

FIELD.NAME: emailoncomplete
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether or not to email teachers when a checklist is completed

FIELD.NAME: lockteachermarks
FIELD.COMMENT: If true, then teachers will be unable to change marks after saving a 'yes'

TABLE.NAME: checklist_item
TABLE.COMMENT: Records the items in the checklist

FIELD.NAME: duetime
FIELD.COMMENT: Date/time when this item is due to be completed

FIELD.NAME: eventid
FIELD.COMMENT: id of the calendar event (if any) associated with this item

FIELD.NAME: moduleid
FIELD.COMMENT: id of the course module (if any) associated with this item

FIELD.NAME: hidden
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether or not the item should be hidden from students

FIELD.NAME: grouping
FIELD.COMMENT: Grouping that the item's module belongs to

FIELD.NAME: linkcourseid
FIELD.COMMENT: The ID of the course that this item is linked to

FIELD.NAME: linkurl
FIELD.COMMENT: An arbitrary URL that this item is linked to

TABLE.NAME: checklist_check
TABLE.COMMENT: Records when items where checked off

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: The user that checked this item

FIELD.NAME: teacherid
FIELD.COMMENT: The userid of the teacher who updated this checkmark

TABLE.NAME: checklist_comment
TABLE.COMMENT: A comment, added by a teacher, to an item on a user's checklist

FIELD.NAME: itemid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the item this comment is attached to

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the user on whose checklist this comment has been added

FIELD.NAME: commentby
FIELD.COMMENT: The userid of the teacher who has added the comment

FIELD.NAME: text
FIELD.COMMENT: The text of the comment, as added by the teacher

INDEX.NAME: checklist_item_user
INDEX.COMMENT: Will usually want to find the comment by both itemid and userid
